description.value:
Special: Daemon Wep, Devastating (2), Unbalanced

Note: Weapon: Glaive. Daemon WP 40 (Khorne Daemon), Bind Str 1. Att.: Bloodlust, Impervious, Thirsting. Must Make -10 WP Test to resist entering Frenzy (or -30 if having Frenzy Talent). Inflicts 1 Fatigue on wounding hit. Gain Prot 40 Force Field with no Overload, causes Psychic Phenomena if protection roll is a double. Two-Handed. Need Mark of Khorne to Wield.
